msContents.summary: The Mahāvīracaritra, drama written by Bhavabhūti. Traditionally it is belived that the part of the drama is written by other author named Subramhaṇya. This manscript mentions this view at the end. It does not include the extended part of the drama.

(1v 1) atha svasthāya devāya nityāya hatapāpmane tyaktakramavibhāgāya caitanyajyotiṣaye namaḥ . nāndyante sūtradhāraḥ bhagavataḥ kālapriyanāthasya yātrāyāmāryyamiśrāssandiśanti . ma (1v 2) hāpuruṣasaṃraṃbho yatra gaṃbhīrabhīṣaṇaḥ prasannakarkkaśā yatra vipulārthā ca bhāratī .
(34r 1) rasvatassāro yatra 2 akzaras gap due to broken leaf. tatassahṛdayaissaṃ [bhā](the sign of ā is lost due to damaged folio.) vanīyodayaḥ samyagbhāvitasaṃvidhānataralassoyaṃ sudhāsundarassandarbho viduṣāmamandahṛdayānandāya sañjāya 1 akzara gap due to broken leaf. m kiñca a 2 akzaras gap due to broken leaf. (34r 2) t . ke vāliprakaraṇe daurātmyādaribhiḥ iti ślokaparyyanto granthasandarbheṇa bhavabhūtikavinā tribhāgaparimitā kathā viracitā avaśyāñca śreyasvinā mayā bhavitavyamiti bharatavākyā (34r 3) hyena granthasandarbheṇa subrahmaṇyakavinā kṛtsnopi kathāśeṣaḥ pūritaḥ iti prācīna paripāṭī niṣkrāntā sarvve saptamoṅkaḥ srīyai (34r 4) namaḥ śrīmate lakṣmīkāntaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ śrī aravindanāthakālai namaḥ śrī śrī (34r 5) likhitamārśaśiṣyo nurohakuntāmativatsare. mahāviracaritrākhyaṃ saṃpurṇoyaṃ nāṭakaḥ (34r 6) na te hi nāṭakaṃ śrīyai namaḥ śrīrāmāya namaḥ sītāyai namaḥ
